data.title: Nice neighborhood city park on 6 acres
data.text: Playground with nearby covered pavilion is nice.  Open area with mesquite trees to run around in.  Small paved trail loops through a little woodsy area, great for kids on bicycles to loop around the park and still be close to parents.  This is a 6 acre park which is quite varied for such a small park.  Good signs displaying information on the local wildlife.  One of the trees has grown around and old engine of a tractor, neat looking
